mn76:16.11: mahākappino → mahākappuno (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | cullāsīti → cūḷāsīti (sya-all, km)
mn76:30.2: tattha tattha → tathā tathā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn76:30.3: aññathātipi → aññathāpi (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | tathātipi → tathāpi (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | evantipi → evampi (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn76:33.1: tāni → idaṃ padaṃ bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu
mn76:35-42.4: Yasmiṃ kho → yasmiṃ kho pana (sya-all, km, mr)
